thread.title: Angola: Economy Minister Clarifies Relaxation of "Angola Invests" Program
thread.title_full: Angola: Economy Minister Clarifies Relaxation of "Angola Invests" Program

title: Angola: Economy Minister Clarifies Relaxation of "Angola Invests" Program
text:
South Africa: Worst 'Hell Week' in History of Idols SA 
Lubango — "The Angola Invest program registers some relaxation in its implementation in the province of Huila, triggered by the present time the country is experiencing, but it may be overcome in the near future," it was said, Saturday, in Lubango, by Economy Minister, Abraao Gourgel. 
Speaking to reporters after the opening of the agricultural and livestock fair, the Cabinet minister said the government is studying mechanisms, in order to overcome the current situation, which has caused embarrassments on the economy and national entrepreneurs. 
He said, however, that entrepreneurs should prioritize dialogue with banks in order to restructure the loans to ensure timely payments. 
He explained that partnerships should be restructured, through dialogue between the entrepreneurs and the banks, and there may be the intermediation of the Ministry of Economy and the National Institute of Small and Medium Enterprises (INAPEM) when needed. Angola 
1º de Agosto hammered on Saturday Desportivo da Huíla by 4-1, in the 20th round of the national first … see more » Copyright © 2015 Angola Press Agency. All rights reserved.
